title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Diversity and Inclusion in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics
purpose: The APPG aims to promote the inclusion and progression of people from diverse backgrounds in Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics (STEM), and to encourage Government, parliamentarians, academics, businesses and others to work towards a STEM sector that is representative of the population.
